00042 SingletonDummy *SingletonServer::attach(std::string const &name,
00043                                         sdummy_factory const &factory) {
00044   single_map::iterator i = m_singletons.find(name);
00045 
00046   if( m_singletons.end()==i ) {
00047     // std::cerr<<name<<" = new Ty()\n";
00048     i = m_singletons.insert(single_map::value_type(name,
00049                                              factory.create())).first;
00050   }
00051   i->second->incr_ref();
00052   return i->second;
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool SingletonServer::detach(std::string const &name) {
00056   single_map::iterator i = m_singletons.find(name);
00057 
00058   if( m_singletons.end()!=i ) {
00059     SingletonDummy *dummy = i->second;
00060     bool del = dummy->decr_ref();
00061     
00062     if( del ) {
00063       m_singletons.erase(i);
00064 
00065       // std::cerr<<name<<" : delete Ty\n";
00066       delete dummy;
00067       return m_singletons.empty();
00068     }
00069   }
00070   return false;
00071 }
